data:
1
00:01:44,465 --> 00:01:45,770
Okay.

2
00:01:51,994 --> 00:01:54,605
Hey, what the fuck? Hey, hey.
Easy. Don't move.

3
00:01:57,042 --> 00:01:58,629
You're making
big mistake, you know that?

4
00:01:58,653 --> 00:01:59,653
Shut the fuck up.

5
00:01:59,741 --> 00:02:01,090
Let's go.
Fuck.

6
00:02:03,353 --> 00:02:07,096
Get the door.
Shut the fuck up.

7
00:02:07,270 --> 00:02:09,968
Watch the fucking jacket,
man. It's new. Shut the fuck up!

8
00:02:19,543 --> 00:02:22,285
Listen to me.
You alert your brother

9
00:02:22,459 --> 00:02:25,070
and I shoot you in the back of the head,
you understand me?

10
00:02:25,245 --> 00:02:27,551
Okay. You're the boss.

11
00:02:29,161 --> 00:02:30,250
Slow.

12
00:02:37,257 --> 00:02:38,954
Yo, yo, yo!

13
00:02:40,260 --> 00:02:42,958
You remember
my pumpkin frappÃ©, huh?

14
00:02:46,788 --> 00:02:48,964
Don't! Don't.

15
00:02:49,138 --> 00:02:51,445
Touch it and he's
fucking dead. Hands up!

16
00:02:53,098 --> 00:02:56,145
Jesus Christ, you dumb motherfucker.
Do you know who we are?

17
00:02:56,319 --> 00:02:58,713
Yeah, I know who you
fucking are. Last January,

18
00:02:58,887 --> 00:03:01,281
the two of you shot an
innocent mother and a kid.

19
00:03:01,455 --> 00:03:03,239
Killed 'em. In Newark.

20
00:03:03,413 --> 00:03:07,374
Oh, yeah? Says who?
Who the fuck are you, huh?

21
00:03:11,203 --> 00:03:12,857
I brought something
to give you.

22
00:03:13,031 --> 00:03:14,076
Uh-huh?

23
00:03:15,512 --> 00:03:17,558
But you have to watch
what I'm doing.

24
00:03:19,647 --> 00:03:20,822
You watching?

25
00:03:22,171 --> 00:03:25,217
Oh! No!

26
00:03:26,349 --> 00:03:28,830
No! No!

27
00:03:41,016 --> 00:03:43,758
Oh, shit. No, no, no.

28
00:03:43,932 --> 00:03:46,021
No, no, no. Fuck!

29
00:03:46,195 --> 00:03:48,153
Fuck, fuck, fuck.

30
00:03:48,328 --> 00:03:50,939
No, don't die.
Don't die, don't die!

31
00:03:51,113 --> 00:03:53,376
Fuck! Fuck. Look at me.

32
00:03:53,550 --> 00:03:56,684
Look at me, you motherfucker,
you can't die! You can't die!

33
00:03:56,858 --> 00:03:58,642
It needs somebody
to fucking pass to.

34
00:03:58,816 --> 00:04:00,992
If you die, it won't
fucking work. Look at me!

35
00:04:01,166 --> 00:04:04,300
Stay alive, you piece of shit.
Stay alive, you piece of shit!

36
00:04:13,918 --> 00:04:16,007
Oh, G... No.

37
00:04:17,792 --> 00:04:19,141
Oh, no.

38
00:04:20,272 --> 00:04:23,928
Oh, no.

39
00:04:28,106 --> 00:04:30,544
Fuck. Fuck.

40
00:04:30,718 --> 00:04:32,241
Fuck!

41
00:04:33,329 --> 00:04:36,201
Now it has no one
to pass to, fuck!

42
00:04:39,161 --> 00:04:40,292
Fuck. Fuck.

43
00:04:40,467 --> 00:04:41,511
No, no, no!

44
00:04:41,685 --> 00:04:43,426
Who the fuck are you?
No one.

45
00:04:43,600 --> 00:04:46,124
Who the fuck are you?
I'm Lewis.

46
00:04:46,298 --> 00:04:49,060
I'm no one. I'm no one. I'm literally no one.
What the fuck you doing here?

47
00:04:49,084 --> 00:04:50,433
Don't shoot me.
Answer me!

48
00:04:50,607 --> 00:04:52,261
What the fuck
are you doing here?

49
00:04:52,435 --> 00:04:54,002
I just buy from them, okay?

50
00:04:54,176 --> 00:04:56,526
I fucking hate those guys.
I hate them, too!

51
00:04:56,700 --> 00:04:58,025
I fucking hate them,
especially him!

52
00:04:58,049 --> 00:04:59,573
Please, don't shoot me.

53
00:05:02,358 --> 00:05:04,360
I didn't know
anybody else was here.

54
00:05:05,056 --> 00:05:07,363
Okay, fuck it.

55
00:05:07,537 --> 00:05:10,584
I didn't fucking know
anybody else was here!

56
00:05:11,846 --> 00:05:13,674
I fucked this whole thing up.

57
00:05:13,848 --> 00:05:16,546
I fucked this whole thing up
and I'm sorry.

58
00:05:18,374 --> 00:05:19,767
This wasn't meant for you.

59
00:05:19,941 --> 00:05:21,116
What?

60
00:05:21,290 --> 00:05:22,857
This wasn't meant for you.

61
00:05:23,031 --> 00:05:24,380
What wasn't meant for me?

62
00:05:26,295 --> 00:05:29,298
I'm sorry.
What? What are you... Fuck.

63
00:05:29,472 --> 00:05:31,256
What are you sorry for?

64
00:05:33,998 --> 00:05:35,043
Fuck.

65
00:05:35,913 --> 00:05:38,307
I'm sorry.
What?

66
00:05:44,444 --> 00:05:45,793
Yo,

67
00:05:45,967 --> 00:05:47,577
who the fuck is that?

68
00:05:48,709 --> 00:05:49,971
Oh, shit.

69
00:05:50,841 --> 00:05:51,886
Ah!

70
00:05:52,452 --> 00:05:53,496
Fuck!

71
00:05:54,541 --> 00:05:56,543
Who has the goddamned key?

72
00:06:00,634 --> 00:06:02,462
Come on! Fuck!

73
00:06:13,298 --> 00:06:15,605
No, no, no, no, don't shoot!
Shit.

74
00:06:15,779 --> 00:06:19,217
Fuck! Alexi and Yev are fucking dead!
Oh, fuck.

75
00:06:20,741 --> 00:06:22,569
Get that piece of shit!

76
00:06:23,483 --> 00:06:24,919
Open it!

77
00:06:26,442 --> 00:06:28,836
Break the fucking door down!

78
00:06:29,010 --> 00:06:30,751
Break it! Break it!

79
00:06:33,101 --> 00:06:34,363
Go! Go!

80
00:06:35,669 --> 00:06:38,149
Move! Move!

81
00:06:39,542 --> 00:06:41,109
Shoot the motherfucker!

82
00:06:48,159 --> 00:06:49,813
Problem solved.

83
00:08:36,093 --> 00:08:39,140
Thank you, everybody.
Now, nearly one year ago,

84
00:08:39,314 --> 00:08:42,926
singer/songwriter
and pop superstar Skye Riley

85
00:08:43,100 --> 00:08:46,234
was fighting for her life
after being injured in a car accident.

86
00:08:46,408 --> 00:08:50,064
An accident that also
tragically took the life

87
00:08:50,238 --> 00:08:51,805
of actor Paul Hudson.

88
00:08:51,979 --> 00:08:54,285
Today, for her first
public interview

89
00:08:54,459 --> 00:08:55,547
since the accident,

90
00:08:55,722 --> 00:08:57,201
ladies and gentlemen,

91
00:08:57,375 --> 00:08:59,290
the one and only Skye Riley.

92
00:09:09,170 --> 00:09:11,085
Oh, my God, Drew!

93
00:09:12,129 --> 00:09:14,305
Thank you so much
for having me.

94
00:09:15,524 --> 00:09:18,048
So happy to be doing this
with you.

95
00:09:18,222 --> 00:09:21,225
I mean, I have got to say that
you look incredible in person.

96
00:09:21,399 --> 00:09:23,639
Oh, my gosh. As do you.
Your hair... I'm obsessed.

97
00:09:23,663 --> 00:09:26,143
Oh, my God. My hair. I was
just trying something new.

98
00:09:26,317 --> 00:09:28,426
I'm not sure if I'm pulling it off.
Um, I... What do we think?

99
00:09:28,450 --> 00:09:30,278
Oh, my God.

100
00:09:30,452 --> 00:09:32,106
Well, I think
you have your answer.

101
00:09:32,280 --> 00:09:34,586
Now you've announced
new tour dates... Yes.

102
00:09:34,761 --> 00:09:37,807
...actually kicking off
right here in New York City

103
00:09:37,981 --> 00:09:40,723
next week. Is this
an emotional comeback?

104
00:09:40,897 --> 00:09:43,857
Yes, a lot of different emotions,
you know, with this one.

105
00:09:44,031 --> 00:09:47,208
A year ago, you had just won a Grammy.
Mm-hmm.

106
00:09:47,382 --> 00:09:50,907
You were in the middle of a big world tour.
Mm.

107
00:09:51,081 --> 00:09:53,910
And then you hit
this rough patch.

108
00:09:54,084 --> 00:09:56,086
"Rough patch" might
be generous.

109
00:09:56,260 --> 00:09:58,828
I was wondering
if you could share anything

110
00:09:59,002 --> 00:10:00,961
from that period of your life.

111
00:10:01,135 --> 00:10:04,138
I was dealing with
a lot of stress and pressure

112
00:10:04,312 --> 00:10:05,879
from the demands of the tour.

113
00:10:06,053 --> 00:10:09,317
And I should have
asked for help, but

114
00:10:09,491 --> 00:10:13,016
instead I drowned it all out
with...

115
00:10:13,190 --> 00:10:17,499
drugs and alcohol
and a lot of bad decisions.

116
00:10:17,673 --> 00:10:20,023
And I let myself get
completely out of control.

117
00:10:20,197 --> 00:10:23,070
And actually, I want to
take this opportunity

118
00:10:23,244 --> 00:10:25,725
to apologize to my fans,

119
00:10:25,899 --> 00:10:29,685
my loved ones, my team.

120
00:10:29,859 --> 00:10:32,993
Everyone who was counting on me
and supporting me.

121
00:10:33,820 --> 00:10:36,518
I let you all down and...

122
00:10:37,258 --> 00:10:38,781
I promise

123
00:10:38,955 --> 00:10:41,131
that will never
happen again.

124
00:10:41,305 --> 00:10:43,177
So, thank you.

125
00:10:45,222 --> 00:10:47,659
You were in the hospital.
When you got out,

126
00:10:47,834 --> 00:10:51,707
what has the time been like
between then and now?

127
00:10:56,581 --> 00:10:59,367
I spent a lot of time
looking inward.

128
00:11:01,586 --> 00:11:04,764
Relearning how to
appreciate life sober.

129
00:11:05,982 --> 00:11:08,115
And I'm...

130
00:11:08,289 --> 00:11:10,639
I'm just so grateful
for this second chance,

131
00:11:10,813 --> 00:11:12,772
and I don't want to waste it.

132
00:11:20,257 --> 00:11:22,912
Car's waiting right
outside by the curb.

133
00:11:23,086 --> 00:11:24,914
There's a bit of a crowd.

134
00:11:35,838 --> 00:11:37,231
Skye!

135
00:11:48,285 --> 00:11:51,071
My name is Ashley.
So nice to meet you.

136
00:12:01,211 --> 00:12:03,300
That went really well.

137
00:12:03,474 --> 00:12:05,520
You were perfectly graceful.
Yeah.

138
00:12:05,694 --> 00:12:07,696
Skye, you've got
Instagram and TikTok

139
00:12:07,870 --> 00:12:10,525
seriously blowing up
right now.

140
00:12:10,699 --> 00:12:14,746
You're trending number two on Twitter.
I mean, you should really be so proud...

141
00:13:07,277 --> 00:13:09,453
Eyes up!

142
00:13:31,649 --> 00:13:32,824
Are you okay?

143
00:13:32,999 --> 00:13:34,478
What happened?

144
00:13:34,652 --> 00:13:36,611
Are you hurt?

145
00:13:36,785 --> 00:13:38,308
Yep, I'm fine.

146
00:13:38,482 --> 00:13:41,572
I'm fine. I think
I just took a weird step.

147
00:13:41,746 --> 00:13:43,966
Let's take a break, everyone.
Can we get some ice?

148
00:13:44,140 --> 00:13:45,446
Anton, I'm fine. I'm fine.

149
00:13:45,620 --> 00:13:47,839
Skye.
Can we please just go again?

150
00:13:48,014 --> 00:13:49,339
I want to get it right, okay?
Okay.

151
00:13:49,363 --> 00:13:50,557
Let's go.
Let's go again.

152
00:13:50,581 --> 00:13:51,974
Line up!
Rewind it.

153
00:13:52,148 --> 00:13:53,889
Yep.
Back to one.

154
00:13:54,716 --> 00:13:56,500
Music.

155
00:14:42,546 --> 00:14:43,808
Shit!

156
00:14:44,679 --> 00:14:46,202
One second!

157
00:14:53,644 --> 00:14:54,994
Yeah, come in.

158
00:14:56,125 --> 00:14:57,431
Hey.

159
00:14:57,605 --> 00:14:58,736
You okay?

160
00:15:00,042 --> 00:15:01,783
You ready to go?
Yeah, Mom.

161
00:15:01,957 --> 00:15:03,393
I just need a minute.

162
00:15:05,178 --> 00:15:08,050
You should feel really good
about today.

163
00:15:09,399 --> 00:15:10,400
I know.

164
00:15:12,402 --> 00:15:13,403
I do.

165
00:15:13,882 --> 00:15:14,926
Good.

166
00:15:17,842 --> 00:15:19,496
We're ready whenever you are.

167
00:15:26,677 --> 00:15:29,463
Final rehearsal is
confirmed for Wednesday.

168
00:15:29,637 --> 00:15:31,484
So we'll be at the venue
first thing in the morning.

169
00:15:31,508 --> 00:15:34,163
You have a fitting,
photo shoot,

170
00:15:34,337 --> 00:15:37,253
then stage walk-throughs,
then a fan meet-and-greet.

171
00:15:37,427 --> 00:15:39,168
Please go straight to bed
when you get home.

172
00:15:39,342 --> 00:15:40,996
It's going to be a long day.

173
00:15:43,651 --> 00:15:45,783
Oh, and reminder:
Darius gets in tomorrow.

174
00:15:45,957 --> 00:15:48,090
He's gonna be here for opening.

175
00:15:48,264 --> 00:15:51,093
I want him
to feel the love, please.

176
00:15:51,267 --> 00:15:53,487
The label is advancing
a lot of money on this tour.

177
00:15:53,661 --> 00:15:55,706
Have I ever not been
good with Darius?

178
00:15:55,880 --> 00:15:58,666
Darius adores you, obviously.

179
00:15:58,840 --> 00:16:01,408
Just want you to remember
who's paying the bill.

180
00:16:16,249 --> 00:16:18,164
Hey, straight to bed, Skye.

181
00:16:18,338 --> 00:16:19,339
Good night.

182
00:16:22,342 --> 00:16:23,343
Miss Riley.

183
00:16:55,375 --> 00:16:56,854
Hey.

184
00:17:01,381 --> 00:17:03,687
What the fuck, Lewis?

185
00:17:03,861 --> 00:17:06,821
What do you want from me?
Vicodin! Just Vicodin.

186
00:17:06,995 --> 00:17:10,303
Just for pain, same as last time.
Fuck that!

187
00:17:10,477 --> 00:17:13,001
Skye Riley isn't just gonna
suddenly show up here.

188
00:17:14,133 --> 00:17:16,091
Your text
said to come over.

189
00:17:16,265 --> 00:17:17,440
What?
What?

190
00:17:17,614 --> 00:17:20,269
What? What?
What? What?

191
00:17:24,404 --> 00:17:27,276
I don't...
I don't remember texting that.

192
00:17:29,496 --> 00:17:31,237
How come I don't remember
texting that?

193
00:17:31,411 --> 00:17:32,847
Oh, fuck.
I don't know.

194
00:17:33,021 --> 00:17:34,762
Just get the fuck off me.

195
00:17:34,936 --> 00:17:35,936
Get the fuck off me!

196
00:17:35,980 --> 00:17:38,418
Oh. Oh, shit.

197
00:17:38,592 --> 00:17:40,811
Holy shit, I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.

198
00:17:44,119 --> 00:17:47,209
I am having the worst week.

199
00:17:54,085 --> 00:17:55,957
The worst!

200
00:17:57,872 --> 00:18:00,962
Lewis... what was
with the sword?

201
00:18:01,876 --> 00:18:04,139
Uh, what? What sword?

202
00:18:04,313 --> 00:18:05,880
Oh, that sword.

203
00:18:06,054 --> 00:18:09,318
I feel...
I'm so sorry about that.

204
00:18:09,492 --> 00:18:12,234
I cannot be too careful
right now. Okay?

205
00:18:12,408 --> 00:18:16,586
I am in the middle of some
genuinely fucking freaky shit.

206
00:18:16,760 --> 00:18:18,936
Okay? I'm talking like
fucking scary,

207
00:18:19,110 --> 00:18:21,156
fucking haunted-house shit,
you know?

208
00:18:24,725 --> 00:18:25,726
Yo...

209
00:18:27,031 --> 00:18:30,121
do you believe in, like,
weird stuff?

210
00:18:31,340 --> 00:18:34,604
Yeah, I'm gonna go.
What? No, no, no!

211
00:18:34,778 --> 00:18:38,217
No, please stay. Please stay.
What am I doing? What am I doing?

212
00:18:38,391 --> 00:18:41,132
Skye fucking Riley's here
and Lewis is being fucking crazy?

213
00:18:41,307 --> 00:18:44,875
I am so stoked to see you.
I am pumped. Come on. Come in.

214
00:18:45,049 --> 00:18:48,444
I will chill. Be my guest.
Please take a seat.

215
00:18:48,618 --> 00:18:51,099
Make yourself at home.
I'm sorry about the mess.

216
00:18:51,273 --> 00:18:53,144
You said you, uh, wanted...
what was it?

217
00:18:53,319 --> 00:18:55,234
You want Vicodin? Right?

218
00:18:55,408 --> 00:18:57,453
Yeah.
I got you. I got you.

219
00:18:57,627 --> 00:18:59,368
Want anything else?
I got banger ketamine.

220
00:18:59,542 --> 00:19:02,937
I got really good
fucking Molly. I got some...

221
00:19:03,111 --> 00:19:06,332
I don't know what this is.
No, dude, just the Vicodin for my back.

222
00:19:08,334 --> 00:19:10,161
Oh, right, your back.

223
00:19:10,336 --> 00:19:13,034
Ouch. That sucks.
I hate that.

224
00:19:13,208 --> 00:19:15,819
Okay, well, you chill,
and I'll be right back.

225
00:19:15,993 --> 00:19:19,040
You chill and I'll be
right back, okay?

226
00:19:19,214 --> 00:19:20,998
I'll be right back. Mmm.

227
00:19:21,172 --> 00:19:23,305
Oh, my God.
You smell good.

228
00:19:23,479 --> 00:19:26,569
I missed you!
Skye fuckin' Riley, dude!

229
00:19:26,743 --> 00:19:29,659
Vicodin. Vicodin.
What the fuck are you thinking?

230
00:19:29,833 --> 00:19:31,400
...could still have

231
00:19:31,574 --> 00:19:33,184
some freezing
or subfreezing temps...

232
00:19:33,359 --> 00:19:34,708
What the fuck?

233
00:19:35,883 --> 00:19:37,232
Ah, shit.

234
00:19:43,978 --> 00:19:46,348
Here's how we see
everything coming together.

235
00:19:46,372 --> 00:19:49,592
The cold air stays in place.

236
00:19:49,766 --> 00:19:53,596
...north of the area...
Freddy. It's some snow.

237
00:19:53,770 --> 00:19:56,556
I mean, this is not a huge
storm. It's not, you know,

238
00:19:56,730 --> 00:20:00,081
an ultra-dangerous situation out there.
It's our first snow of the season.

239
00:20:00,255 --> 00:20:04,390
Over in pop culture news,
singer/songwriter Skye Riley is back,

240
00:20:04,564 --> 00:20:07,610
nearly one year after
she was hospitalized in a car crash

241
00:20:07,784 --> 00:20:10,221
that tragically killed
actor Paul Hudson.

242
00:20:10,396 --> 00:20:12,916
Hudson had been driving the vehicle
after the high-profile couple

243
00:20:13,050 --> 00:20:16,227
had left a private party where both
were reportedly seen intoxicated.

244
00:20:16,402 --> 00:20:18,322
Yeah, you know,
that accident occurred

245
00:20:18,404 --> 00:20:20,754
while Riley was in the middle
of a blockbuster tour

246
00:20:20,928 --> 00:20:23,322
and at the time,
there was speculation

247
00:20:23,496 --> 00:20:25,889
surrounding Riley's substance abuse.

248
00:20:26,063 --> 00:20:27,891
Especially after candid photos
of the singer

249
00:20:28,065 --> 00:20:30,329
went viral just two weeks
before the acc...

250
00:20:40,382 --> 00:20:44,125
Hey, uh, Lewis, I kind of have
a really early morning tomorrow, so...

251
00:20:53,221 --> 00:20:54,440
Lewis!

252
00:20:57,181 --> 00:20:59,488
This fucking guy.

253
00:21:02,317 --> 00:21:04,101
Lewis, what the fuck, man?

254
00:21:16,679 --> 00:21:17,941
Lewis!

255

to a drug dealer's death,

514
00:50:54,020 --> 00:50:56,892

life and fuck up everything.

515
00:50:57,066 --> 00:51:01,288
And it's not your fault.
I keep seeing his face everywhere.

516
00:51:01,462 --> 00:51:03,943
I just feel so fucked up!
Yeah, no wonder.

517

518
00:51:07,294 --> 00:51:08,991
Oh, God, I'm sorry.

519
00:51:09,166 --> 00:51:10,926

all of this on you.

520
00:51:11,037 --> 00:51:12,212
I just...

521

523

524

525

526

527

531

I already forgave you.

532
00:54:38,505 --> 00:54:41,160

533

I feel like my brain is...

534

535

536

538

540
00:55:08,535 --> 00:55:10,798

to quiet the noise,

541

542

you're a horrible person.

543

544
00:55:31,776 --> 00:55:32,864
Gemma?

545
00:55:50,621 --> 00:55:51,796
Gemma?

546

547
00:56:16,255 --> 00:56:17,604

548

551

554

555

Come to rehearsal with me today.

556

557
00:56:52,944 --> 00:56:56,164

Do you have to go?

558

I made a commitment.

559
00:56:58,166 --> 00:57:01,300

can you start tomorrow?

560

I mean, I don't know. I sort of
feel like this is like a thing

567
00:57:26,064 --> 00:57:27,744

568
00:57:33,767 --> 00:57:36,378

I'm so sorry. It's my fault.

569
00:57:36,553 --> 00:57:38,250
But I'm ready.
I'm ready, let's do this.

570
00:57:38,424 --> 00:57:41,253
Sorry, everyone.
I'm here. I'm so sorry.

571
00:57:42,254 --> 00:57:43,690
Sorry.

572
00:57:58,879 --> 00:58:00,272
I need some water
for my daughter.

573
00:58:00,446 --> 00:58:02,840
For my daughter,
I need some water.

574
00:58:03,014 --> 00:58:04,450
I need a waiter
with some water.

575
00:58:04,624 --> 00:58:05,886
I need a waiter
with some water.

576
01:00:13,840 --> 01:00:15,624
Oh, fuck!

577
01:00:16,234 --> 01:00:17,234
God!

578
01:00:19,846 --> 01:00:22,283
Oh, my God! Fuck!

579
01:00:22,457 --> 01:00:24,590
Oh, fuck, fuck!

580
01:00:24,764 --> 01:00:26,810
Fuck!

581
01:00:26,984 --> 01:00:29,943
Oh, God.
Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck.

582
01:00:32,946 --> 01:00:34,034
Are you okay?

583
01:00:34,208 --> 01:00:35,775
My leg!

584
01:00:35,949 --> 01:00:38,430
What happened? What's wrong?
My...

600

I fucking saw you, Joshua!

I would never,

604

Fuck you. Fuck you!
Okay.

605
01:03:00,267 --> 01:03:02,487

606

Fuck you!

607

615

616
01:03:26,163 --> 01:03:27,773

617

619

620

621

622

623

Okay.

624
01:03:43,876 --> 01:03:45,922

625
01:03:47,967 --> 01:03:49,751

626
01:03:49,926 --> 01:03:52,189
I don't know! I don't know!
I just...

627
01:03:53,625 --> 01:03:57,759
Fuck, I feel crazy all the time.
Everything's going wrong.

628
01:03:57,934 --> 01:04:02,025
Nobody will fucking listen to me
and everyone fucking hates me.

629
01:04:02,199 --> 01:04:04,723
Oh, come on, do you hear

630
01:04:04,897 --> 01:04:08,205
We're all here for you. We're

631

632
01:04:10,772 --> 01:04:13,340
I think doing this tour
was a huge mistake. It's...

633

Okay, you know what?

634
01:04:16,953 --> 01:04:19,694
We're gonna, um, look at the

635

carve out some time for you
to decompress before opening.

636
01:04:22,306 --> 01:04:24,482
But right now
you need to pull it together

637
01:04:24,656 --> 01:04:26,658
and get back out there.

638
01:04:26,832 --> 01:04:29,232
Because we need to be on time
for Darius's foundation event.

639

Fuck, no. Mom, please
don't make me do that.

640
01:04:32,011 --> 01:04:34,579
I can't get out on stage
in front of a bunch of people tonight.

641
01:04:34,753 --> 01:04:36,494
Skye.
Mom, you're not...

642

Fuck, you're not
listening to me!

643
01:04:39,018 --> 01:04:40,759
I am not in the headspace

644
01:04:40,933 --> 01:04:42,891

and play dancing monkey

645
01:04:43,066 --> 01:04:46,286
in front of a room full of strangers!
Darius is counting on you

646
01:04:46,460 --> 01:04:48,201
to be there, okay?

647
01:04:48,375 --> 01:04:50,029
You gave him your word.

648
01:04:50,203 --> 01:04:52,945
You are a woman
who keeps her word.

649
01:04:53,119 --> 01:04:55,426
You are not gonna cancel
on a commitment

650
01:04:55,600 --> 01:04:57,297

651
01:04:57,471 --> 01:05:00,213
right before launching a tour.

652
01:05:21,234 --> 01:05:25,804
Music Inspires Hope
was founded on the idea

653
01:05:25,978 --> 01:05:28,067
that no dream could be too big.

654
01:05:30,243 --> 01:05:32,985
With the help and support
of everyone in this room

655
01:05:33,159 --> 01:05:35,814
and from all of our donors
across the country,

656
01:05:35,988 --> 01:05:37,903
the foundation has been able

657
01:05:38,077 --> 01:05:41,689

this year than ever before.

658
01:05:42,995 --> 01:05:44,475
Thanks to you,

659
01:05:44,649 --> 01:05:47,217
more and more children
every day

660
01:05:47,391 --> 01:05:51,656

their wildest dreams a reality.

661
01:05:51,830 --> 01:05:54,833
And now without further ado,

662
01:05:55,007 --> 01:05:57,357
it is my great pleasure

663
01:05:57,531 --> 01:05:59,403
to introduce... Ten seconds.

664
01:05:59,577 --> 01:06:03,015

Ladies and gentlemen,

665

hands together... I'll take that.

666
01:06:05,452 --> 01:06:08,325

667
01:06:17,812 --> 01:06:19,031
Wow.

668
01:06:19,205 --> 01:06:20,641
Thank you.

669
01:06:22,208 --> 01:06:23,731
Thank you so much.

670
01:06:28,997 --> 01:06:30,825
Good evening,
ladies and gentlemen.

671
01:06:30,999 --> 01:06:32,871
I'm Skye Riley,

672
01:06:33,045 --> 01:06:34,394
and I'm here tonight to...

673
01:06:35,656 --> 01:06:36,701
Uh...

674
01:06:41,967 --> 01:06:44,100
I'm here tonight to...

675
01:06:44,709 --> 01:06:45,884
Uh...

676
01:06:46,058 --> 01:06:48,060
Oh, that's, uh...

677
01:06:56,155 --> 01:06:58,505
So, how's everyone
doing tonight?

678
01:06:58,679 --> 01:07:00,942
Hope you're all
enjoying the party.

679

Uh. Don't worry, though.
I'm sober.

680
01:07:03,902 --> 01:07:05,164
So...

681

Um...

682

What can I say about

683
01:07:18,525 --> 01:07:19,918
Well,

684
01:07:20,092 --> 01:07:22,312

everything I ever wanted.

685

Then again, music did almost
kill me, so there's that.

686
01:07:28,492 --> 01:07:31,190
Uh... Well, I...
I guess that's not fair.

687
01:07:31,364 --> 01:07:33,149
Music didn't put
all those drugs up my nose,

688
01:07:33,323 --> 01:07:34,323
I did.

689
01:07:38,154 --> 01:07:39,677
Um...

690
01:07:42,332 --> 01:07:45,161
I... I think
I'm supposed to be up here

691
01:07:45,335 --> 01:07:50,557

692
01:07:50,731 --> 01:07:53,169
Well, when I think about
what I wish someone would have

693

and first getting started,

694

I suppose I'd say

695
01:08:00,437 --> 01:08:03,091

696
01:08:03,266 --> 01:08:07,879
And, uh, you'll spend years
of your life chasing success

697
01:08:08,053 --> 01:08:10,534
you know, thinking that
when it comes,

698
01:08:10,708 --> 01:08:14,538
it will magically fix,
you know, everything

699

700
01:08:18,455 --> 01:08:21,109
And then you achieve success,
and you realize that it can't fix

701
01:08:21,284 --> 01:08:23,851
the deeply broken person
that you have always been.

702
01:08:24,025 --> 01:08:26,985
And now you can't escape

703
01:08:27,159 --> 01:08:29,944

that you've become,

704
01:08:30,118 --> 01:08:31,511
and one day, you realize

705
01:08:31,685 --> 01:08:33,121
how badly you wish you could

706
01:08:33,296 --> 01:08:34,819
just trade it all just for

707
01:08:34,993 --> 01:08:36,273
one fucking moment of happiness!

708
01:08:46,526 --> 01:08:48,485
Oh.

709

Sorry about that. Uh...

710

711

712

truly inspired tonight.

713

714

715

716

717

718
01:09:20,212 --> 01:09:21,212
Paul Hudson.

719
01:09:23,998 --> 01:09:25,043
What?

720
01:09:26,523 --> 01:09:28,264
Why does it say that?
That's not...

721
01:09:29,830 --> 01:09:30,918
This... No. Why did s...

722
01:09:33,051 --> 01:09:34,052
This... Why did...

723
01:09:35,271 --> 01:09:37,534
What?

724
01:09:45,368 --> 01:09:46,543
No.

725
01:09:48,806 --> 01:09:49,850
No.

726
01:09:53,419 --> 01:09:54,855
No.

727
01:09:55,029 --> 01:09:56,248
No, stay away from me.

728
01:09:56,422 --> 01:09:58,381
Stay away from me!

729
01:09:59,860 --> 01:10:00,948
Paul's dead!

730
01:10:01,122 --> 01:10:02,733
You're not Paul!

731
01:10:02,907 --> 01:10:05,301
Stop smiling at me!

732
01:10:08,695 --> 01:10:09,695
No, no.

733
01:10:12,960 --> 01:10:14,962
I can hold it. No, no, stop.

734
01:12:27,921 --> 01:12:28,922
Okay.

735
01:13:39,776 --> 01:13:43,823
Okay.
Okay. Okay. Okay.

736
01:14:12,983 --> 01:14:14,332
Do you see it?

737
01:14:22,993 --> 01:14:25,038
It just stares at me,

738
01:14:25,212 --> 01:14:26,910

739

Skye!

740
01:16:11,188 --> 01:16:13,494
Thank you for agreeing to see...
Wait, what are you doing?

741

Sending a photo of you to my friend
in case you're some kind of creep.

742
01:16:17,020 --> 01:16:18,543
What? I'm not a creep.

743

Yeah, that's what
every creep says.

744

Look, I realize
you're super famous,

745
01:16:26,507 --> 01:16:29,380

privacy. I apologize.

746
01:16:29,554 --> 01:16:31,295
This is also
very weird for me.

747
01:16:31,469 --> 01:16:32,869
How do you know Lewis?
I don't.

748
01:16:33,036 --> 01:16:35,299
I... I didn't.

749
01:16:35,473 --> 01:16:37,475
I was trying to
contact Lewis to warn him.

750
01:16:37,649 --> 01:16:39,649
Tracked down his address
and went to his apartment.

751
01:16:39,782 --> 01:16:42,108
The front door was unlocked,
and he was already dead inside.

752

I checked his phone, and you were
the last person he texted with.

753

W-What were you trying
to warn him about?

754
01:16:48,007 --> 01:16:51,445

is going to sound completely insane,

755
01:16:51,619 --> 01:16:53,883

756
01:16:54,057 --> 01:16:58,409

757
01:16:58,583 --> 01:17:01,107

of metaphysical being.

758
01:17:01,281 --> 01:17:03,414

are you talking about?

759

760
01:17:08,419 --> 01:17:11,161

761
01:17:11,335 --> 01:17:13,293
But it disguises itself

762

Like smiling people.

763

been infected by it can see it.

That's some supernatural bullshit.

765

haven't you?

766

That's why you're still
sitting here.

767
01:17:31,311 --> 01:17:33,749
I...

768
01:17:33,923 --> 01:17:35,763
I don't know.
I don't know what's happening.

769
01:17:35,794 --> 01:17:37,970
I feel like I'm losing
my goddamn mind!

770
01:17:38,144 --> 01:17:40,340
That's precisely what this thing does to you.
It's what it did to Lewis

771
01:17:40,364 --> 01:17:42,583
while it was latched onto him.
It's like a parasite

772
01:17:42,758 --> 01:17:44,542
that infects the host
through their mind.

773
01:17:44,716 --> 01:17:47,327
In less than a week,
it drives the host insane.

774
01:17:47,501 --> 01:17:50,026
It's like it feeds off
all the bad shit in their head,

775
01:17:50,200 --> 01:17:52,419
and then
once it's done feeding,

776
01:17:52,593 --> 01:17:55,292
it forces the host to kill
themself in front of a witness.

777
01:17:55,466 --> 01:17:57,816
And then that witness
becomes the new host.

778
01:17:57,990 --> 01:17:59,470
That's how you got it
from Lewis.

779
01:17:59,644 --> 01:18:02,212
It was passed to Lewis
by a cop in Jersey.

780
01:18:02,386 --> 01:18:03,972
That cop was the first one
I tried to contact,

781
01:18:03,996 --> 01:18:05,824
but I guess he went
off the grid.

782
01:18:05,998 --> 01:18:07,715
That cop caught it
from some doctor, who got it

783

from a patient, who got it
from a college professor.

784
01:18:09,349 --> 01:18:11,003

keeps going back.

785
01:18:11,177 --> 01:18:12,962

I can show you.

786
01:18:13,136 --> 01:18:14,416

all of this?

787

Because it killed my brother.

788
01:18:17,793 --> 01:18:19,925
My brother was a host

789

790
01:18:23,276 --> 01:18:25,278
He tried to tell me
what was happening to him.

791
01:18:25,452 --> 01:18:27,150
But he made it hard
to trust him,

792
01:18:27,324 --> 01:18:28,499
and the stuff he was saying

793
01:18:29,413 --> 01:18:32,416
sounded certifiably crazy.

794
01:18:32,590 --> 01:18:36,507
He begged me for help.
But I didn't listen.

795
01:18:36,681 --> 01:18:38,901
And then a few days later...

796
01:18:39,075 --> 01:18:40,641
...I got a call informing me

797

with a crowbar.

798
01:18:49,215 --> 01:18:51,535
Well, have you gone
to the police? And say what?

799
01:18:51,696 --> 01:18:53,829
My brother's suicide
was actually caused

800
01:18:54,003 --> 01:18:57,223

that no one else can see?

801

stop this thing anyway.

802
01:18:59,443 --> 01:19:01,377
So I'm just supposed to wait
until this thing kills me?

803
01:19:01,401 --> 01:19:02,620

804
01:19:02,794 --> 01:19:05,101

How?

805
01:19:05,275 --> 01:19:08,495

the chain stops

806
01:19:08,669 --> 01:19:12,151

807

808
01:19:14,458 --> 01:19:17,417

just like other parasites,

809
01:19:17,591 --> 01:19:18,723

810

811

812
01:19:23,162 --> 01:19:24,729

813

814
01:19:26,557 --> 01:19:28,254

815

816

817

818

819

820

821

out of your fucking mind?

822
01:19:45,141 --> 01:19:46,446

823
01:19:46,620 --> 01:19:48,060
"Extreme"?
You're asking to kill me!

824
01:19:48,231 --> 01:19:50,189
Whoa, hey. Just keep it down.

825
01:19:50,363 --> 01:19:52,278
I don't even know you.
I don't even know you!

826
01:19:52,452 --> 01:19:54,454
My name is Morris.
I'm an ER nurse,

827
01:19:54,628 --> 01:19:56,630

it's gonna kill you

828

829

831

You're nearly out of time!

832
01:20:08,773 --> 01:20:11,210
This thing has been feeding
on you for three days already!

833
01:20:11,384 --> 01:20:14,039
It's already taking control
of your brain, and pretty soon

834
01:20:14,213 --> 01:20:16,433

the ways it's manipulating you,

835

We have to go right now.

836
01:20:19,784 --> 01:20:22,265

Holy shit. Dude.

837

That's Skye? It's Skye Riley!

838

Fuck!

Fuck!

Fuck!

Jesus Christ! I swear...

I fucking...

903

905

909

910

911

912

914

916

917

918

919

920

921

922

Please, please.

926

927

928

929

930

No, no. I can't. I...

946

951

952

953

954

955
01:32:40,916 --> 01:32:42,613

956
01:32:42,787 --> 01:32:44,397
Years of my life.

957
01:32:45,355 --> 01:32:48,097

And here I am,

958
01:32:48,271 --> 01:32:53,102

of my being to support you.

959

960

961

962

963

Do it! Throw it away!

965

966

969

970

971

It's not real.

No, no.

Fuck.
